mapper.select: SELECT a.`id`, a.`title`, a.`user_id`, a.`introduce`, a.`file_path`, a.`file_type`, a.`file_format`, a.`file_byte_size`, a.`file_format_size`, a.`tag`, a.`create_time` AS `applyTime`, i.`name` AS `username`, i.`icon` AS `userIcon` FROM `share_resource_apply` a, `basic_user_info` i WHERE a.`status` = 0 AND a.`user_id` = i.`id` ORDER BY a.`create_time`
